Thanks.  This smokes the original release and is slightly more laid back than the 2006 CD remaster.  Would've been nice to include artwork though.

The Dynamic Range of the remastered version is 9. The original is 12â€Ś

If you take a look to the spectrum in Adobe Audition you see that the 88.2kHz is totally useless !

The noise is higher to the original version.

So it MAY sound better the first time but if you egalise the volume, it's not as good as the original CD version !!!

Thanks for the upload anyway. ;)

@ lepoussi Thank you for the feed back.

I'm aware of the lack of dynamic range, although I would say these are slighty more dynamic than the 2006 audio CD release. These aren't brickwalled to quite the same extent.

I hope they release a remaster in the future without any dynamic range compression.

Perhaps MFSL may work on one in the future?

Here's hoping.
